name: Magic Bean🍃
description:
Magic Bean

This is the ultimate test of skill and determination : 🫘Magic Bean🍃 , an intense platformer❕

Each level is designed to push the limits of your abilities, with precision timing and quick
reflexes required to overcome the obstacles in your path. With mind-bending level design, and increasing difficulty,
Magic Bean will keep you on the edge of your seat as you strive to reach new heights.

This game is only for the players looking for a real chalenge, it's super hard and there is no mercy❕⚔️💀

Climbing


In Magic Bean you have to jump from platform to platform to reach the next stage, but be careful: if you fall you have to start again, so don't confuse speed with precipitation !

Upgrade


You can unlock teleporters, buy tools, improve them and improve your character.
Choose wisely, because your choices can greatly influence your success.

Tools


There are tools that are like skills that can be unlocked and can be a great help in your climb.

Hard Challenge

Good luck, you will need it❗
